actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 19, 1965, to provide additional authorization for the Library of Congress James Madison Memorial Building.

summary.text: Amends the Federal law which authorizes the construction of the James Madison Memorial Building, as part of the Library of Congress, to increase the authorization of appropriations for such construction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of October 19, 1965, to provide additional authorization for the Library of Congress James Madison Memorial Building.
